EditorData.stateContext: Doesn't necessarily play on seeing boat. Wulbren could use this line without freeing the tieflings or after freeing the tieflings, for instance.

Text.Value: I can't stand this place. What's the hold up?

EditorData.NodeContext: quiet and tense  - waiting by the boat and safe for now, but that could change at a moment's notice

Text.Value: Boat's free - let's go!

EditorData.NodeContext: calling out to player - doesn't want to leave but knows he won't survive if he waits

Text.Value: Get to the boat, or we leave without you!

EditorData.stateContext: Guards have sounded the alarm. The prisoners hear this.
If a character was on the way to the boat and couldn't leave because of various reasons,

Text.Value: I hope Rolan is all right... Please, let's just get out of here.

EditorData.NodeContext: quiet and tense  - waiting by the boat and safe for now, but that could change at a moment's notice

Text.Value: Go, GO, GO!

EditorData.NodeContext: Panicked - player is in the middle of combat holding off the guards as he flees with the other prisoners

Text.Value: Just a bit further - I know I can make it!

EditorData.NodeContext: determined and hopeful - run through all of moonrise and just arrived outside (character is about to teleport out of sight)

EditorData.stateContext: IN COMBAT. One person signals that they have to defend the boat.
IN COMBAT. Is preparing boat for departure. Under a LOT of stress.

Text.Value: Damn it - they'll be on us in no time. Move!

EditorData.NodeContext: an alarm has just started blaring, knows guards will arrive any moment

Text.Value: Shit. This thing is chained up - keep them off me!

EditorData.NodeContext: gritted teeth, trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat. Trying not to panic

Text.Value: There must be a way around.

EditorData.NodeContext: looking around, frantic but trying to keep his cool

Text.Value: A guard could pass by any moment - we need to go.

EditorData.NodeContext: quiet and tense  - waiting by the boat and safe for now, but that could change at a moment's notice

Text.Value: I will make it out - I will.

EditorData.NodeContext: running for his life, trying not to panic

Text.Value: There's no time.

EditorData.NodeContext: leaving without the player, broken hearted and filled with regret

Text.Value: The boat is our way out - come on!

EditorData.NodeContext: running through prison - hope at seeing a way out

EditorData.stateContext: Character is about to disappear out of sight outside the tower, past the docks area.
OUT OF COMBAT. Another character is nearby and this character is idling by.

Text.Value: Done!

EditorData.logicalname: CAL: Boat leaves after this line

Text.Value: If they reach the boat we're dead! Hold them back!

EditorData.NodeContext: combat has begun, tense but determined

EditorData.stateContext: OUT OF COMBAT. Is preparing boat for departure. Under stress.

Text.Value: Deep breath - just keep running.

EditorData.NodeContext: running through a prison - enemies all around you

EditorData.stateContext: OUT OF COMBAT. Running for their life to whatever escape point they may reach. It could be the boat, it could be the pier outside.

Text.Value: I've... almost... got it...

EditorData.NodeContext: struggling to break the chains that have tied up the boat (no guarantee of what he'll be using, either barehands or a discovered weapon)

Text.Value: The boat's chained up tight, hold on.

EditorData.NodeContext: trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat (no guarantee of what he'll be using, either barehands or a discovered weapon)

Text.Value: Damn it, I'm almost there!

EditorData.NodeContext: gritted teeth, trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat. Trying not to panic

Text.Value: Can we agree to leave and never mention the 'Absolute' again?

EditorData.NodeContext: quiet and tense  - waiting by the boat and safe for now, but that could change at a moment's notice

Synopsis: Collection of solo ADs used by character during the Jailbreak escape in Moonrise Towers.
